dcterms:creator: Brenden M. Lake
Marco Baroni
dcterms:description: SCAN involves learning to follow instructions such as 'walk twice and look right' by performing a sequence of appropriate output actions; in this case, the correct response is to 'WALK WALK RTURN LOOK.' A range of SCAN examples are shown in the paper. Seq2seq models are trained on thousands of instructions built compositionally from primitives, modifiers, and conjunctions.
dcterms:title: SCAN
